description:
Product focused engineering teams are a unique competitive advantage and how global products need the local flavor to succeed.

Harsh Sinha is VP of Engineering at TransferWise, the international money transfer platform. Prior to TransferWise he was Director of Product at PayPal and led eBay's Local initiatives as Director of Engineering.
short_description: Product focused engineering teams are a unique competitive advantage and how global products need the local flavor to succeed. H
title: Scaling A Global Product
